com.hazelcast.client.config

Class ClientAwsConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.config.AliasedDiscoveryConfig<AwsConfig>
      • com.hazelcast.config.AwsConfig
        • com.hazelcast.client.config.ClientAwsConfig
  • Deprecated. 
    Use AwsConfig instead.

    @Deprecated
public class ClientAwsConfig
extends AwsConfig
    The AWSConfig contains the configuration for client to connect to nodes in aws environment.

    • Method Detail

      • isInsideAws

        @Deprecated
public boolean isInsideAws()
        Deprecated. 
        If client is inside aws, it will use private ip addresses directly, otherwise it will convert private ip addresses to public addresses internally by calling AWS API.
        Returns:
        boolean true if client is inside aws environment.

      • setInsideAws

        @Deprecated
public ClientAwsConfig setInsideAws(boolean insideAws)
        Deprecated. 
        Set to true if client is inside aws environment Default value is false.
        Parameters:
        insideAws - isInsideAws

      • setProperty

        public ClientAwsConfig setProperty(String name,
                                   String value)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the property understood by the AWS SPI Discovery Strategy.

        Note that it interprets the "inside-aws" property and maps it to the contrary of the generic "use-public-ip" property.

        Overrides:
        setProperty in class AliasedDiscoveryConfig<AwsConfig>
        Parameters:
        name - property name
        value - property value
        Returns:
        the updated Client Aws Config
